General.Name: Bever Holding NV
General.Description: Bever Holding NV operates as a real estate company in the Netherlands and Belgium. The company develops residential and non-residential properties. It also invests in, acquires, and leases real estate properties. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is based in Wassenaar, the Netherlands.

0.Name: Mr. Willy Jules Simon
0.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Interim Exec. Director
